last_episode_to_air.name: From Loss to Light: A Cold Justice Update Special
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kelly shares exclusive updates on past cases, answers most-asked questions, and catches up with family members and fan-favorite cops.

name: Cold Justice
overview: From Executive Producer Dick Wolf,Â this true crime investigative series follows veteran prosecutor Kelly Siegler, and her rotating team of seasoned detectives, as they travel to small towns across the country and help local law-enforcement agencies dig into unsolved homicide cases that have lingered for years without answers or justice for the victims due to lack of funding and proper forensic technology.
tagline: When hope walks out, we walk in.

episodes.name: Small Town Suicide? (Cuero, TX)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda travel to Cuero, TX, as they look to reopen a 2001 cold case and hope to discover if Pam Shelly was killed or if she committed suicide.

episodes.name: Mother (Morehouse Parish, LA)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda travel to Morehouse Parish, LA, as they look to reopen a 2006 cold case and hope to discover new clues that help solve the murder of an active church member in the community.

episodes.name: Home Town Hero (Palacios, TX)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda head to Palacios, TX, to look for new clues in the 1982 murder of a successful agricultural business owner.

episodes.name: Hit and Run (Globe, AZ)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda travel to Globe, AZ, to search for clues about an apparent 1988 hit-and-run that may have been the result of a teenage dispute.

episodes.name: Hiding in Plain Sight (Dickson County, TN)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda head to Dickson County, TN, to look for new clues that may help solve the 1998 murder of a likeable grocery story owner.

episodes.name: Small Town Tragedy (Thatcher, AZ)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda travel to Thatcher, AZ, to look for clues that may lead to resolution in the 1995 murder of a mother of two young children.

episodes.name: Hatchet (Sandusky County, OH)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda travel to Sandusky County, OH, to search for new information that may help solve the 1988 murder of a 49-year-old mother of six, who was killed with a hatchet.

episodes.name: Blind Love (Gaines County, TX)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda head to Gaines County, TX, to search for new clues to help solve the 2008 murder of well-liked feed plant worker.

episodes.name: Gone (Altus, OK)
episodes.overview: Season 2 begins with investigators Kelly and Yolanda landing in Oklahoma to unearth clues in the 2001 vanishing of a mother of two.

episodes.name: A Monster Among Us (Camp Hill, AL)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda journey to Alabama to investigate a 2005 murder.

episodes.name: High School Sweethearts (La Porte, TX)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda travel to small-town Texas to probe the 2007 double murder of a married couple.

episodes.name: First Love (Cottonwood, AZ)
episodes.overview: The 1997 murder of a teen in small-town Arizona is probed.

episodes.name: He Said, She Said (Vigo County, IN)
episodes.overview: The 1998 slaying of a 19-year-old girl is investigated.

episodes.name: Ambush (Malvern, AR)
episodes.overview: A 2002 double murder in small-town Arkansas is investigated.

episodes.name: Single Working Mom (Galatin, TN)
episodes.overview: The 2010 slaying of a single mother is investigated.

episodes.name: Billy Goat Hill (Chattanooga, TN)
episodes.overview: The 1997 murder of a mother of two is investigated.

episodes.name: Lady in the Box (Aurora, CO)
episodes.overview: Siegler and McClary head to Aurora, Colo.

episodes.name: Copper Dollar Ranch (Jasper, IA)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda land in Iowa to investigate a 1983 double murder.

episodes.name: Stranded (Bay City, TX)
episodes.overview: Investigators try to determine how a woman who was stranded in a hotel parking lot met her death.

episodes.name: Death by Design? (Waller County, TX)
episodes.overview: The slaying of an up-and-coming fashion designer is investigated.

episodes.name: Kirby's Speed Shop (Columbus, GA)
episodes.overview: Siegler and McClary search for evidence that may help them find out who could have double crossed a mechanic found shot to death in his shop.

episodes.name: Justice Served
episodes.overview: In this special episode, America's Most Wanted host John Walsh interviews the Cold Justice investigative team, who gives behind-the-scenes insights into the investigations. Exclusive updates on past cases will show how some of the family members and cops are doing today. Also, Kelly and Yolanda will answer questions from the Cold Justice fans.

episodes.name: Sunspot Highway (Alamogordo, NM)
episodes.overview: Investigators find a discarded body along a remote mountain road; the team calls on TV host Nancy Grace to help get word out to the public.

episodes.name: Other Side of the Tracks (Cambridge, OH)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda travel to Cambridge, Ohio, to search for the person responsible for the death of a pregnant teenager after remains are found near a lake.

episodes.name: Second Thoughts (Paulding, OH)
episodes.overview: Investigators search for answers in the murder of a single mother who was found bludgeoned to death.

episodes.name: Fool Me Once, Fool Me Twice? (Vigo County, IN)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda try to determine if it was an accident after an electric clock radio is found in a bathtub full of water with a dead woman.

episodes.name: Still of the Night (Pocatello, ID)
episodes.overview: A sweet young woman was found brutally stabbed to death in her bedroom. Kelly and Yolanda are in the precarious position of finding her killer amidst multiple possible suspects.

episodes.name: Miss Congeniality (Yakima County, WA)
episodes.overview: A young mother of three is found shot to death in her car that was pulled over on the side of a highway. Kelly and Yolanda are now faced with the difficult task of finding a killer who seemed to disappear under the dark cover of night.

episodes.name: Burned (Fairview Park, OH)
episodes.overview: An upbeat, free-spirited 67-year-old grandmother was found burned to death in her home and it's up to Kelly and Yolanda to determine how the fire was started and who was responsible.

episodes.name: Mother Daughter Tragedy (Fort Wayne, IN)
episodes.overview: In 1993, a 29-year-old mother and her six-year-old daughter were found strangled to death in their home. Kelly and Yolanda head to Fort Wayne, IN, and put all of their efforts into seeking out the person responsible for this tragic and heartbreaking double murder.

episodes.name: Operator, Help (St. John's County, FL)
episodes.overview: After a young mother places a mysterious call to the operator, her teenage daughter later finds her brutally stabbed to death in their home.

episodes.name: The Record Keeper (Bridgeport, WV)
episodes.overview: The diary of an older man who was stabbed to death in Bridgeport, WV, could help Kelly and Yolanda solve his murder.

episodes.name: Little League Dad (Arlington, TX)
episodes.overview: When a Little League coach from Arlington, TX, is bludgeoned to death in his own bed, Kelly and Yolanda must figure out who would possibly want to kill such a beloved figure in the community.

episodes.name: American Dream (Fort Myers, FL)
episodes.overview: When a family with dreams of a better life moves from India to Florida, their lives are torn apart after the young mother abruptly disappears without a trace. In this episode, Kelly and Yolanda head to Fort Myers, FL, to face the challenge of navigating through different languages and cultural traditions as they try to figure out what really happened to her.

episodes.name: The Alley (Hialeah, FL)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda must piece together an intricate puzzle to find out who is guilty of killing a well-liked, young man.

episodes.name: Devoted (Okaloosa, FL)
episodes.overview: The team must put together clues left behind by a mother of two who mysteriously vanished from Fort Walton Beach, FL.

episodes.name: Lying in Wait (Greenville, OH)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Yolanda search for answers in the double homicide of a middle-aged man and woman who were shot inside the man's house.

episodes.name: Trip to Nowhere (Hernando County, FL)
episodes.overview: The team investigates a missing person's case from 1981 in which a daughter came home from school to find her mother gone without explanation.

episodes.name: Beloved Doctor (Paducah, KY)
episodes.overview: After a respected doctor in the community is brutally murdered and set on fire in his kitchen, the team must wade through the ashes of the tragic aftermath to try to bring his family justice.

episodes.name: Smoking Gun (Cleveland, TN)
episodes.overview: When a bright-eyed college student is killed in his sleepy hometown of Cleveland, TN, the team must sort through his private past in order to find his killer.

episodes.name: The Good Life (West Palm Beach, FL)
episodes.overview: When a bright-eyed college student is killed in his sleepy hometown of Cleveland, TN, the team must sort through his private past in order to find his killer.

episodes.name: Off the Beaten Path (Spartanburg, SC)
episodes.overview: A South Carolina couple is shot to death in their home with no signs of a robbery, leading the Cold Justice team into the remote areas of Spartanburg County to try to uncover their killer.

episodes.name: Room #10 (Fort Myers, FL)
episodes.overview: The Cold Justice team returns to Fort Myers, Fla., to put their investigative skills to work on a 22-year-old murder case of a woman found shot in the head, covered in bloody sheets and dumped behind a community rec center.

episodes.name: The Escape? (Oregon County, MO)
episodes.overview: Kelly Siegler and Detective Steve Spingola look into a case where a young mother caught in an abusive relationship contemplates leaving her town behind. When she then disappears, it leaves the Cold Justice team to wonder if this was murder or if she was forced to run for her life.

episodes.name: Up in Flames (Johnson County, IA)
episodes.overview: The Cold Justice team goes to Iowa to work with the Johnson County Sheriff's Office on the 1995 case of a mother and gifted artist who was found dead in her car after a huge explosion.

episodes.name: Trajectory
episodes.overview: The Cold Justice team hopes to uncover the truth behind a death of a young man from a few years ago. Kelly, Yolanda and Orlando Martinez work with state police and firearm experts across the country to get to the bottom of what happened.

episodes.name: Justice Served (Los Angeles, CA)
episodes.overview: In this special episode of the series, host John Walsh interviews the Cold Justice investigative team, who give behind the scenes insights into the investigations, and provides updates on past cases.

episodes.name: In the Neighborhood, Pt 1 (White Settlement, TX)
episodes.overview: In this 2 part episode, the Cold Justice Team investigates two different murder cases at the same time. A 1992 sexual assault and stabbing death of Laura Walsh in her home, and, months later, a double homicide of two young men, Gene Giddens and Jonathan "Keith" Durington, whose throats were slashed. Both crimes happened in the same neighborhood and all 3 victims were set on fire after their deaths leaving local law enforcement with three unsolved murders. The team will have to determine if these two cases are potentially connected, and help bring whomever is responsible to justice.

episodes.name: In the Neighborhood, Pt 2 (White Settlement, TX)
episodes.overview: The White Settlement, TX, investigation continues. After interviewing a large number of suspects, the team seems to be getting nowhere, until a recorded phone call of Doughlas Wright changes the outlook of the investigation.

episodes.name: One of Our Own
episodes.overview: Kelly is back on her own turf in Texas to look into a cold case sheâs never forgotten â the 1991 murder of Mary Jane LeFlore, a 35-year-old wife, mother of two young boys and employee of the Texas Department of Criminal Justice. Kelly and Steve join local law enforcement to reinvestigate the case to see if there is any evidence that could help solve this tragic homicide.

episodes.name: Fresh Wounds
episodes.overview: Kelly and Johnny aid local law enforcement and dig into their freshest case yet, the two-year-old disappearance of a professional photographer. DNA testing and cell phone data analysis could be the key to cracking the case.

episodes.name: A Deadly Inheritance
episodes.overview: Kelly and her team head to Oregon to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a man who vanished from home without a trace. There are seven suspects, missing gold coins and serious questions about what happened to Glenn Pennie.

episodes.name: Beyond The Grave
episodes.overview: Facing their oldest case yet, Kelly and Johnny head to Mississippi to find out if the tragic death of a young man was a suicide, accident, or murder. Itâs a Cold Justice first when local law enforcement exhumes the body of the victim.

episodes.name: Home Alone
episodes.overview: In Hope, Arkansas, Kelly and Johnny investigate the murder of a young mother who was brutally executed in her home. The clues to her killerâs identity may rest in the hands of her 10-year-old son who was in his bedroom at the time.

episodes.name: The Widow
episodes.overview: In a crime that terrified a community, Kelly and Tonya investigate the tragic stabbing death of an elderly woman in her own home just one week after she buried her husband.

episodes.name: If I Can't Have You, No One Can
episodes.overview: Kelly and her team tackle one of their most emotional cases yet involving the murder of a beautiful college student killed in her bedroom while packing for a trip to visit her parents for Thanksgiving.

episodes.name: Cabin in the Woods
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve take on a case in his home state of Wisconsin and must navigate a tangled family tree of witnesses and suspects to find the killer of a loving husband fatally shot in his cabin.

episodes.name: Dying Declaration
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve head to Flint, Michigan, to investigate the 1991 shooting of a woman murdered right outside her home. As she died in her sister's arms, her final words could provide insight into who killed her.

episodes.name: Covet
episodes.overview: Kelly and Aaron Sam head to Lake Charles, Louisiana to investigate the shocking murder of a young man who was gunned down in his car after attending church on Palm Sunday.

episodes.name: Small Town Secrets
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve head to Wisconsin to investigate a homicide; the case becomes personal after they receive a letter from the victimâs daughters; their search uncovers a townâs dark side, crimes against children and lies within a church.

guest_stars.character: Self - Cpt., Oneida County Sheriff's Office
guest_stars.name: Terri Hook

episodes.name: The Professors End
episodes.overview: Kelly and Tonya investigate the strange death of a retired college professor in Tonyaâs home town, whose cremation was halted by an anonymous tip call hinting at murder; an autopsy proves the tipsterâs information is accurate.

episodes.name: Holding Onto Hope
episodes.overview: Kelly and Johnny return to their home state of Texas to look into the disappearance of a young mother in 2000, whose family has never given up on her; while some suspect murder, others claim to have seen her on the run with a mystery man.

episodes.name: Down By the Lake
episodes.overview: Ruled accidental, Kelly and Johnny Bonds look into the 2011 drowning death of 19-year-old Blayne Davis, whose mother suspects foul play.

episodes.name: Danger at Dawn
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey investigate the cold-blooded murder of a fun-loving Texas country boy shot in the back of his head; it could the result of a love triangle gone tragically wrong.

episodes.name: Preacher's Mother
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve investigate the brutal slaying of beloved mother Eloise Payne, who was stabbed 38 times in her Michigan home; a mysterious car spotted in the area may hold the key to identifying her killer.

episodes.name: No Safe Return
episodes.overview: Kelly and Aaron Sam look into the disappearance of a father who tragically vanished just before he could move back home to his family; they ask if a financial windfall could have had something to do with the man's disappearance.

episodes.name: Bound and Burnt
episodes.overview: Kelly and Johnny investigate the twisted murder of a new grandmother who was strangled and set on fire in an abandoned school bus; things get personal when the primary suspects turn out to be Kelly's neighbors.

episodes.name: Pain in Pawhuska
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve investigate the brutal slaying of an Oklahoma teenager whose night of cruising and partying turned deadly. Could a scandalous town rumor have led to her death? The team searches for justice 22 years later.

episodes.name: The Case Behind the Billboards
episodes.overview: Kelly and Johnny uncover new details in the tragic 27-year-old unsolved murder of Kathy Page, a case that shocked a small town and inspired the award winning film âThree Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri.â

episodes.name: Death Among Him, Part 1 (Carbon County, WY)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Tonya head to Wyoming to work with Carbon County Law Enforcement to look into the mysterious deaths of two women years apart, but connected by the same circle of friends.

episodes.name: Death Among Him, Part 2 (Carbon County, WY)
episodes.overview: In part two of their investigation, the Cold Justice team continues to investigate three mysterious deaths in Wyoming, hoping they will be able to finally give answers to all the families involved.

episodes.name: Backwater Bloodshed (Concordia Parish, LA)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve head into Louisiana to work with the Concordia Parish Sheriff's Office and investigate the 2016 homicide of a 26-year-old whose body was found on the banks of the bayou. Can the team finally bring justice to his grieving family?

episodes.name: Golden Years Gone (Prowers County, CO)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey head to Colorado to help the Prowers County Sheriff's Office investigate the 1991 homicide of a beloved elderly couple who were brutally killed while working at their local VFW Hall.

episodes.name: A Mother's Dying Wish (Hernando County, FL)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve return to Hernando County, FL, to help look into the two decades old homicide of a 21-year-old woman who disappeared after a late night party, and her body was discovered years later in a nearby orange grove.

episodes.name: Texas Tragedy
episodes.overview: The Jasper County Sheriff's Department assist Kelly and Johnny as they sort through family drama and doomsday rumors to help a daughter unravel the mystery surrounding the 2012 disappearance of her 56-year-old mother.

episodes.name: Family Betrayal (Idaho Falls, ID)
episodes.overview: Kelly travels to Abbey's home state to work with the Idaho Falls PD to help investigate the 2007 homicide of a young mother. When her body was discovered almost 3 years later outside the city, it left a family searching for her killer.

episodes.name: Horror In The Home (Amarillo, TX)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve work with the Potter County Sheriff's Department in Amarillo, TX, in investigating the brutal murder of a doting mother of four. Will DNA testing help them find the murderer and answers for her grieving kids?

episodes.name: Valentine's Day Violence
episodes.overview: Kelly and Tonya investigate the 2016 murder of Heyzel Obando, a young Florida mother shot to death in her own home. Itâll take cutting-edge forensic technology and old-school interrogation techniques to catch her killer and bring justice to her grieving mother.

episodes.name: Small Town Predator
episodes.overview: Kelly and Johnny team up to tackle the 1988 murder of Cindi Smith whose headless body was found at a cemetery after a night at a local bar. The patrons of the bar could hold the key to identifying her killer and getting her family justice.

episodes.name: Mystery on the Mountain
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey investigate the 2012 disappearance of Brian Shookman, a young father who was traveling to Idaho to attend a family reunion, but never showed up. As the list of suspects grows, can the team uncover the truth behind his vanishing?

episodes.name: Double Life Discovered
episodes.overview: Kelly and Johnny investigate one of their oldest cases ever -- the brutal 1984 murder of Johnnie Albritton, an elderly store owner in Texas known for having a wife with a violent temper. Was his death the robbery gone wrong it appeared to be, or a plot of his wifeâs design?

episodes.name: Digging For Answers
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve head to Oregon to help solve the 1993 murder of a young man allegedly shot and buried by a group of dangerous criminals. They'll need to pit them against each other to crack the case and finally bring justice to his family.

episodes.name: Deadly Affairs
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve investigate the 2016 homicide of Stacey Devine, a hard-working mother who was strangled to death and dumped in a ditch. Was it a random act of violence, or did her strained marriage factor in to her murder?

episodes.name: A Family's Nightmare
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey search for new clues in the fatal shooting of a mother of six that was initially considered suicide. Their investigation exposes a heart-breaking trail of secrets hidden for 25 years.

episodes.name: Fatal Betrayal (Fort Myers, FL)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey return to Fort Myers, FL, to tackle the 1997 murder of Keith Jones, an aspiring police officer mugged and shot in his motel room; multiple suspects include a female witness that may have set him up.

episodes.name: Holiday Homicide
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey head to Stafford, Texas to investigate the cold-blooded killing of a tow truck business owner, Jerry Don Humphrey. Their investigation uncovers a twisted world of alleged abuse, infidelity, and a possible murder-for-hire plot.

episodes.name: Deadly Premonition
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve try to solve the mysterious murder of a father beaten and shot to death in his home with his 6-year-old daughter asleep nearby. The key to identifying his killer may lie in the secret audio recordings found in his attic.

episodes.name: A Touch of Evidence
episodes.overview: Kelly and Tonya investigate the shocking murder of Leola Jordan, a 91-year-old grandmother in Picayune, Mississippi who was stabbed nearly 40 times in her bed. New DNA technology may help identify her killer and reveal a tragic family secret.

episodes.name: Unnatural Causes (Rio Arriba County, NM)
episodes.overview: In Rio Arriba County, NM, Kelly and Steve investigate the strange case of a man who appeared to have died from natural causes. But when his cremation revealed a bullet in his body, his death became a murder investigation. Is it too late to crack the case?

episodes.name: An Officer's Promise
episodes.overview: Kelly and Tonya help police keep their promise to a grieving mother to solve her daughter's murder. An examination of the victim's cell phone data brings a horrifying tale of obsession and brutality to light.

episodes.name: Out In the Cold
episodes.overview: Kelly and Terri tackle the mysterious 1986 murder of a young Native American mother whose skull was found in the woods. Her infant daughter, now grown, is desperate to know if her father was involved.

guest_stars.character: Self - Cpt., Oneida County Sheriff's Office
guest_stars.name: Terri Hook

episodes.name: A Desperate Father
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve investigate the tragic murder of a 17-year-old girl found strangled to death by the railroad tracks. When their investigation hits roadblock after roadblock, can they uncover the truth and get justice for her grieving father?

episodes.name: A Small Town Conspiracy
episodes.overview: In a case that fascinated true crime fans, Kelly and Abbey investigate the 2006 homicide of Candace Hiltz, a teenage mother fatally shot just feet away from her infant daughter. Is there any truth to the rumors corrupt cops were involved?

episodes.name: Sifting Through the Ashes
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve try to solve the murder of a woman who was brutally stabbed and then lit on fire in an attempt conceal the crime. Could a neighborâs report of a mysterious black truck lead investigators to her killer?

episodes.name: Victim or Villian?
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve investigate the tragic homicides of a pregnant mother and her two-year-old son who died in an apartment fire while her husband escaped. An arson specialist is called in to help make sense of the clues and catch the killer.

episodes.name: Father's Day Massacre
episodes.overview: In their freshest cold case yet, Kelly and Steve tackle the recent double-homicide of a loving grandfather and his elderly mother gunned down at home; the crime scene suggests a killer with military training.

episodes.name: Three Generations Gone
episodes.overview: Kelly and Tonya delve into the grisly multiple murders of a young mother, grandmother, toddler, and newborn baby; forensic handwriting analysis could help identify the killer and author of a frightening message written on the wall.

episodes.name: A Mother's Last Words
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey investigate the brutal slaying of a pregnant woman who was able to call 911 but died before naming her killer. Eyewitnesses at a nearby bar could help crack the case-if they'll talk.

episodes.name: Shot in the Dark
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve look into the 2007 murder of a single father who was gunned down by a sharpshooter with a high-powered rifle. State-of-the-art digital forensics may help poke a hole in the suspect's alibi.

episodes.name: Dangerous Rendezvous
episodes.overview: On June 13, 2018 in Dunlap, TN, 42-year-old single mom Tiffany Holbert went for her nightly walk and vanished. The last time she was seen alive was by an ATM security camera, which could hold the key to solving her disappearance.

episodes.name: For Love or Money?
episodes.overview: Kelly and Terri investigate the 2015 homicide of a beloved father, veteran and Little League coach. A re-examination of the crime scene reveals a terrifying clue into who may have killed him.

guest_stars.character: Self - Cpt., Oneida County Sheriff's Office
guest_stars.name: Terri Hook

episodes.name: The Key to the Crime, Part 1
episodes.overview: For their 100th case, the Cold Justice team examines the 2007 murder of popular college student Anita Knutson stabbed to death in her bed, in Minot, ND. They'll need the help of their forensic pathologist, digital forensics expert and DNA lab to solve the case.

episodes.name: The Key to the Crime, Part 2
episodes.overview: In part two of their 100th case, the Cold Justice team continues their investigation into the murder of popular 18-year-old college student Anita Knutson. Will they be able to finally give answers and justice to her grieving family?

episodes.name: Burning Mystery
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve investigate the biggest unsolved case in East Texas - the 1992 death of a popular teen whose charred remains were found in her car.

episodes.name: Double Disappearance
episodes.overview: For the first time, Kelly and Steve investigate two missing persons cases at once, a loving mother and her high school friend who vanished just months apart.

episodes.name: Trail of Terror
episodes.overview: The team tackles the twisted murder case of Rhonda Richardson, who went searching for her lost dog and was later found seemingly scalped by a sadistic killer; the biggest twist is a new piece of evidence that breaks the case wide open.

episodes.name: On Holy Grounds
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve investigate the brutal homicide of a beloved seminary student who was brutally hung and stabbed to death in the chapel restroom; their investigation reveals even more dark secrets and sinister deeds.

episodes.name: Deadly Abduction
episodes.overview: In 2000, a young mother was abducted from a parking lot and executed in a nearby field; state-of-the-art DNA testing may provide the answer.

episodes.name: Digging for Justice
episodes.overview: Kelly and Tonya investigate the mysterious disappearance of a mother who went missing after a Fourth of July celebration; an old tip on where her body might be buried takes a turn when cadaver dogs signal they've found something.

episodes.name: Beloved Veteran
episodes.overview: Kelly and the team help the Lake Station Police department look into the 2007 slaying of a kind-hearted WWII veteran killed with a sledgehammer. Tracing the purchases on his stolen credit card may be the key to solving the case.

episodes.name: Silenced
episodes.overview: The Cold Justice team help the Abilene Police Department investigate the heartbreaking double homicide of a devoted mother and her young daughter strangled in their home. Can DNA evidence left at the scene identify their killer?

episodes.name: Killer at the Door
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve join the Kankakee Police Department to help a woman who just missed seeing her mother's killer at their front door when she was 11 years old. Decades later, can she recall any clues to help crack the case?

episodes.name: Enemy Next Door
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve extend their stay in Illinois to help the Kankakee Police Department look into another mysterious case â the unsolved homicide of a beautiful mother-to-be and her unborn child. Did a love triangle she was involved in turn deadly?

episodes.name: Some Kind of Monster
episodes.overview: Kelly, Tonya and the Alcoa Police Department investigate the brutal 1990 rape and murder of a beloved 80-year-old grandmother. Was it a sadistic random intruder or a member of her own family?

episodes.name: The Reporter
episodes.overview: Jennifer Servo was a beautiful, ambitious reporter when she was shockingly murdered in 2002. Kelly and Steve are determined to help the Abilene Police Department catch her killer.

episodes.name: Stolen Beauty
episodes.overview: Kelly and Abbey help the Beaumont Police Department investigate the 1999 disappearance of a popular single mother. Did one of the men seeking her affection take their obsession too far?

episodes.name: Stabbed in the Heart
episodes.overview: On the morning of his graduation, a young man discovered his father dead on his front steps, stabbed in the heart. It's up to the Cold Justice team and Anderson County Sheriff's Office to put together the pieces and solve this shocking crime.

episodes.name: Bound and Gagged
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve head to his home state to aid the Racine Police Department in solving the homicide of a young mother abducted from her job as a security guard and found bound and gagged in the trunk of her car.

episodes.name: House of Horrors (1)
episodes.overview: Kelly and Steve team up with the Anderson County Sheriff's Office to solve the horrific quadruple homicide of a family on Halloween. Their investigation reveals a family feud, trail of stolen cash and bloody shoe print left by the killer.

episodes.name: House of Horrors (2)
episodes.overview: The Cold Justice team and the Anderson County Sheriff's Office continue their investigation into the quadruple homicide of a family of four. Will they be able to finally give answers and justice to their grieving family and community?

episodes.name: From Loss to Light: A Cold Justice Update Special
episodes.overview: Kelly shares exclusive updates on past cases, answers most-asked questions, and catches up with family members and fan-favorite cops.

guest_stars.character: Self - Cpt., Oneida County Sheriff's Office
guest_stars.name: Terri Hook
